pageContext.claim: “Looking forward to being with Dan Bishop in two weeks, in North Carolina. His opponent believes in Open Borders and Sanctuary Cities, and won't protect your Second Amendment!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims McCready was for "open borders" but his campaign website said he wants comprehensive immigration reform "that secures our border, respects our laws and protects our American values." He calls for the government to "reinforce physical barriers with the technology Dan used in the Marines, like infrared cameras and drones." The Raleigh News & Observer rated the statement about sanctuary cities as "half true." What are commonly known as sanctuary cities are not permitted in North Carolina but McCready said it should be up to sheriffs to cooperate with ICE. Overall, the newspaper said, Trump's statement earns a mostly false.
